org.gearman

Class Gearman

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearman.Gearman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GearmanService

    public abstract class Gearman
extends java.lang.Object
implements GearmanService
    A Gearman object defines a gearman systems and creates gearman services. These services include GearmanWorkers, GearmanClients, and GearmanServers. All services created by the same Gearman object are said to be in the same system, and all services in the same system share system wide thread resources.
    Author:
    isaiah.v

                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Starts a new local gearman job server running in the current address space.
        Parameters:
        port - The port numbers this server should listen on.
        persistence - An application hook used to tell the server how to persist jobs
        Returns:
        A new gearman server instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an IO exception occurs while attempting to open the given port
